title: Ping issues
body: I i'm in Canada, i usually have 30-50 ms, but i now i have over 80 ms with spike internet lag, i wonder if it just me or the NA server's problem

replies.body: i have the same problem, have no idea what to do though

It sounds like your network is having some issues keeping a strong connection to the game server, or possibly how you're routing to us.  I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to optimize your network and rule out any possibility.  Let me know how that works out for you.
